Name: Polar Bear Game
About the game: The arctic is a big place. Ever wanted to explore the endless expanses of the arctic as a Polar Bear? Well now you can in Polar Bear Game. Explore and survive a procedurally generated , infinite world, where, as a polar bear, you can choose whatever you want to do! Who's going to stop you? Gather resources and build your own house to keep your polar bear safe from the unknown dangers of the arctic night. Make sure you make a campfire before the sun sets, as the dark is deadly! Hunt enemies and bosses to level up your polar bear and make yourself stronger, you can find items in the world to either make the most tank polar bear imaginable or a glass cannon. The more days you survive, the harder the game gets, and the procedurally generated bosses are no different. How long will you survive? Polar Bear Game features: Procedurally generated infinite worlds Building Crafting Procedurally generated bosses (could even be a chair!) Increasing difficulty as you survive Polar Bears!
